originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

originalTitle: ‘Absurd and provocative’: Huckabee faces firestorm for Israel border stance
title: ‘Absurd and provocative’: Huckabee faces firestorm for Israel border stance
content: Egypt, Jordan, Saudi Arabia denounce US ambassador's remarks suggesting Israel has right to much of the Middle East.

originalTitle: Slovakia threatens to cut electricity to Ukraine over Russian oil spat
title: Slovakia threatens to cut electricity to Ukraine over Russian oil spat
content: Slovakia and Hungary vexed after Russian oil flows via Ukraine halted by alleged Russian drone strike last month.

originalTitle: NASA rules out March launch for manned moon mission over technical issues
title: NASA rules out March launch for manned moon mission over technical issues
content: Artemis 2 is a precursor to the US space agency's planned astronaut moon landing with Artemis III scheduled for 2028.

originalTitle: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
title: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
content: The student protesters honoured thousands of those killed when nationwide mass protests were put down last month.

originalTitle: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
title: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
content: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.

originalTitle: Nasa astronauts' moon mission delayed due to rocket issue
title: Nasa astronauts' moon mission delayed due to rocket issue
content: The mission to the far side of the Moon and back will be postponed after problems with were spotted with its rocket, a Nasa official said.

originalTitle: Red cards and poor home form - Chelsea 'set fire to points'
title: Red cards and poor home form - Chelsea 'set fire to points'
content: Chelsea have more red cards than any side in the Premier League this season, and boss Liam Rosenior says they have "set fire" to points.

originalTitle: 'Drive and hunger' take Milner to Premier League appearance record
title: 'Drive and hunger' take Milner to Premier League appearance record
content: Brighton's James Milner starts against Brentford to break the all-time Premier League appearance record in his 654th match.

originalTitle: 'Like a dream' - Abraham relishing Villa return
title: 'Like a dream' - Abraham relishing Villa return
content: Seven years since firing them into the Premier League, Tammy Abraham is back scoring goals at Aston Villa to keep their fans and players dreaming of glory.
